name: Sacred Grove: Text Exchange
description:
🍁🌸 About 🌸🍁

This is a derivative of the game Sacred Grove, which was created by the majority of the university course "Reach Out & Touch Fate" by Prof. Florian Berger. Text Exchange adds more text-focused content and features.

🍁🌸 Game Description 🌸🍁

🌷 write messages

🌷 receive messages

🌷 search for traveller

🍁🌸 Repository Link 🌸🍁

Check out the repository.  It also contains the original game Sacred Grove of which this game is derived from.

🍁🌸 Credits 🌸🍁

🌷 Aleksandar Malinov

🌷 Boyan Dobrev

🌷 Hui Yan Veronica Kwok

🌷 Kelly Yuan Qing Liang

🌷 Sunaina "Sunny" Miller

🍁🌸University of Applied Sciences Europe 🌸🍁

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe. Supervised by: Prof. Florian Berger "Reach Out & Touch Fate"  (WinterSemester 2021/22)
